package.name: page_navigation_transition
package.description: A comprehensive Flutter package providing 110+ beautiful page navigation transitions with Hero support, Custom Curves, Presets, and Performance Optimizations
package.author: Satish Parmar

categories.name: Slide Transitions
categories.description: Transitions that slide pages in from various directions

transitions.name: PushPageTransition
transitions.description: Push transition where both pages move together

transitions.name: CoverPageTransition
transitions.description: New page covers the old one

transitions.name: RevealPageTransition
transitions.description: Old page slides away to reveal the new one

transitions.name: BouncySlidePageTransition
transitions.description: Slide with bouncy effect at the end

categories.name: Fade Transitions
categories.description: Transitions using opacity and fade effects

transitions.name: CrossFadePageTransition
transitions.description: Cross fade between old and new pages

categories.name: Scale Transitions
categories.description: Transitions using scale and zoom effects

transitions.name: ShrinkGrowPageTransition
transitions.description: Old page shrinks while new page grows

transitions.name: ZoomInPageTransition
transitions.description: Zoom in from small to full size

transitions.name: ZoomOutPageTransition
transitions.description: Zoom from large to normal size

transitions.name: RotationScaleFadePageTransition
transitions.description: Rotation with scale and fade effects

categories.name: Size Transitions
categories.description: Transitions using size and clip animations

transitions.name: PageCurlPageTransition
transitions.description: Page curl effect like turning a book

transitions.name: InsideCubePageTransition
transitions.description: View from inside a rotating cube

transitions.name: CircularRevealPageTransition
transitions.description: Circular reveal from a center point

SharedAxisDirection.description: Direction for Material shared axis transitions

TransitionType.description: Type of transition for named routes

heroTransitions.description: Hero-aware transitions that coordinate with Flutter's Hero widget

curveBuilder.description: Fluent API for creating custom animation curves

namedRouteSupport.description: Use transitions with Flutter's named routes

factoryClass.name: PageTransitions
factoryClass.description: Static factory class for creating transitions
